The report showed that Medicaid alone doles out $37 billion a year of improper payments, a 157% increase since 2013. Medicaid accounted for 26% of all the improper payments made by the federal government in fiscal year 2017. @CMSgov needs to do more to address this problem.

Today marks the 1-year anniversary of the #HSGAC report on Medicaid fraud and overpayments. @HHSgov fraud totaled nearly $6 billion, by far the highest of any federal agency.
